definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
"speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
to add up the total/to figure what sth amounts to/to consider

sentences.english: This paper deals with the floristic statistics, analysis of the 418 species on wild ligneous plants.
sentences.chinese: 本文对418种野生木本植物进行了区系统计和分析。

sentences.english: Calorimeter can only measure optical pulse energy of nanoJoules.
sentences.chinese: 研制了用于测量皮焦尔量级光脉冲的微能量计。

sentences.english: The wiper of the potentiometer is connected directly to the spindle.
sentences.chinese: 电位计的孤刷直接与销子连接。

sentences.english: Besides preface and final words, the thesis consists of 3 chapters, about 50,000 Chinese characters.
sentences.chinese: 除序言和结语外，全文共三章，计5万余字。

sentences.english: And millions of people across the country have been able to keep their health insurance.
sentences.chinese: 全国数百万计的人民已能保持他们的健康保险。

sentences.english: Millions of people starved to death during the war.
sentences.chinese: 战争中数百万计的人挨饿至死。

sentences.english: If a Daywork Schedule is not included in the Contract, this Sub -Clause shall not apply.
sentences.chinese: 如果合同中没有计日工报表，则本款不适用。

sentences.english: The string wire stress gauges were used in the field service.
sentences.chinese: 现场实测采用钢弦式钢筋应力计。

sentences.english: Tensiometers can be made small enough .
From the area of southeast meter disconsolate, youhen full word.
sentences.chinese: 绝域从军计惘然，东南幽恨满词笺。

sentences.english: This mode is equivalent to a potentiometer that is adjusted to the required setting.
sentences.chinese: 这种模式相当于是调整到所需的设置电位计。

sentences.english: The matter that will register on bank draft is best and whole plan come down for future reference.
sentences.chinese: 将银行汇票上登记的事项最好全部计下来备查。

sentences.english: The market value of some tranches has slumped to less than ten cents on the dollar.
sentences.chinese: 以美元计，一些份额市值已降至不足十美分。

sentences.english: Then it atomically decreases the semaphore count.
sentences.chinese: 然后它自动地减少信号的计数值。

sentences.english: Billion of dollars make many every of us swirl.
sentences.chinese: 数十亿计美元的投入让每一个人都在彷徨。

sentences.english: Wrist sphygmomanometer shows consideration everywhere and solicitude everywhen.
sentences.chinese: 腕式血压测试计，处处体贴，时时关怀。

definition: to disregard/to take no account of
to convert into/to amount to/to be equivalent to
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
to press/to push/to leave aside or shelve/to control/to restrain/to keep one's hand on/to check or refer to/according to/in the light of/(of an editor or author) to make a comment
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
to convert/conversion/(in accounting, referring to currency conversion) translation
